title: of the Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005) are delegated to Anne Rabbitte,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) (No. 2) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health (delegation ministerial functions) (no 2) order 2020

title: of the Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005) are delegated to Anne Rabbitte,
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Health conferred on him by or under – 

(a) Part 2, and 

(b) 

sections 31 and 32, 

of the Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005) are delegated to Anne Rabbitte, 
Minister of State at the Department of Health. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [395] 3

title: of the Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005) are delegated to Anne Rabbitte,
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Health (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2020 delegates 
to Anne Rabbitte, Minister of State at the Department of Health the statutory 
powers and duties of the Minister for Health mentioned in the Order. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [395]
